last_episode_to_air.name: The Judgement
last_episode_to_air.overview: Can Aaina and Myra find the universal truth in this twisted mystery?

name: Ardhsatya - Jeevan Ke Rahasya
overview: Brought back together after 17 years of separation, sisters Aaina and Myra Bisht discover they have supernatural powers and start a brand-new journey with Ardhsatya - World's First Detective Agency for the dead.
